# Description

I am the CIO / IT Director of the Erasmus University. My interests are in supporting science by bringing digital opportunities and transformations to the research community, supporting Open Science and FAIR principles, and in general contributing to the impact of the EUR through digitalization. My skills are in IT, management, and IT security.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Wout van Wijngaarden"
special_skill <- NULL

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open access", all_of(special_skill), "data management", "open source software", "data sharing", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
